trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when Windows authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 Windows 驗證時，請設定 ASP.NET 應用程式使用者的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: When the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>, the WindowsAuthenticationModule sets the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the Windows identity supplied by IIS for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 當驗證<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>設為<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>，WindowsAuthenticationModule 集<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>至<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件，代表目前的要求提供 IIS 的 Windows 識別。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the WindowsAuthenticationModule uses the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 會使用匿名驗證，則 WindowsAuthenticationModule 使用傳回的識別<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WindowsAuthenticationModule exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: WindowsAuthenticationModule 所公開的<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件，可讓您提供的自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal><xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>物件</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal></xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件透過指定名為的副程式**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0, using the WindowsAuthenticationModule class with the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 中的 IIS 7.0，使用與 WindowsAuthenticationModule 類別<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>類別不支援。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated mode, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需相容性問題，以整合模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[從 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 應用程式移轉至 IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會呼叫這個建構函式來建立執行個體的<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>類別。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫之後建構函式，它會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>方法來初始化新<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>物件。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: 發生於應用程式會驗證目前的要求。

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: 期間會引發驗證事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can access the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取的驗證事件<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>類別藉由指定名為的副程式**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> object supplied to the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs>物件提供給**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the Windows identity supplied by IIS is used as the identity for the current request.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性期間**WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件時，IIS 提供的身分識別用於做為識別目前要求的 Windows。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: If IIS uses anonymous authentication, then the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A> property is set to the identity returned by the <xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IIS 使用匿名驗證，則<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>屬性設定為傳回的識別<xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetAnonymous%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationEventArgs.Identity%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised only when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> and the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **WindowsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**就會引發事件時，才驗證<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>設<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>和<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>是應用程式使用中的 HTTP 模組。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0 running in Integrated Mode, the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is not raised when both the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> and the IIS `AnonymousAuthenticationModule` modules are enabled.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 中執行的 IIS 7.0 中整合模式中，驗證事件的<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>時未引發兩個 ASP.NET<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>和 IIS`AnonymousAuthenticationModule`模組已啟用。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, to receive authentication notification, subscribe to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，若要收到驗證通知，訂閱<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>執行個體。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關整合式模式的相容性問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[從 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 應用程式移轉至 IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的記憶體之外的所有資源釋都出<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: Init 方法可確保<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>隨附於處理<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref>執行個體。
